row.question: A college has 10 basketball players. A 5-member team and a captain will be selected out of these 10 players. How many different selections can be made?
row.rationale:
A team of 6 members has to be selected from the 10 players. This can be done in 10C v 6 or 210 ways.
Now, the captain can be selected from these 6 players in 6 ways.
Therefore, total ways the selection can be made is 210×6= 1260
ANSWER:D
